body:
**Describe the solution you'd like**

Today all setting of search attributes is eagerly validated and is guaranteed when retrieved from the server to have the `type` metadata set, except for the search attributes set on the workflow of a schedule (not to be confused with search attributes of the schedule itself). We need to bring search attributes on workflows of schedules in line w/ all others with regards to validation and metadata.

Please make sure the backwards-incompatibility ramifications are taken into account. If we eagerly validate search attributes where we didn't before, someone's automated process that creates a schedule with a future workflow _and then_ creates search attributes is now going to fail.
title: Eagerly validate and put proper metadata on search attributes for on schedule workflow action
